contact.title: Contact us
contact.description: At first, we will try to understand the clients needs and propose proper solution

workflow.title: Development Process
workflow.subtitle: Our workflow
workflow.description: In FTECH-IT we have a cohesive team of professionals across various IT fields, enabling us to handle projects end-to-end without needing external specialists. No matter how complex the project is, all you need to provide is the idea â€” FTECH-IT will take care of everything else

cards.title: Requirements Gathering and Business Analysis
cards.description: Our business analysts will gather all the details of the upcoming project and create a scope of tasks for the technical team

cards.title: Budget Estimation and Coordination
cards.description: The project is structured into a comprehensive set of tasks and subtasks, each of them is estimated in terms of hours with fixed pricing depending on the specialist performing the work. In FTECH-IT we ensure that our final budget estimates are both clear and transparent. We provide a detailed breakdown of how each dollar of your budget will be allocated.

cards.title: Development
cards.description: Whether it's a web or mobile application, FTECH-IT will always recommend the optimal tech stack for your idea or professionally implement your technical vision of the project

cards.title: Testing
cards.description: Strong team of AQA and QA professionals will ensure the stability and reliability of your application

cards.title: Production Deployment
cards.description: Our DevOps specialists will deploy your project on the server and help you choose the optimal hardware configuration based on your load

cards.title: Project Support
cards.description: If needed we are ready to provide long-term support for your solution. Also we offer a warranty period during which any discovered issues or bugs will be fixed completely free of charge

challenges.title: Showcasing versatility and ability to adapt to different challenges
challenges.subtitle: Project challenges
challenges.description: Our projects span various industries, from real estate to technology, showcasing our versatility and expertise

contact-us.title: Contact us
contact-us.description: Our team is dedicated to providing excellent customer service and ensuring your experience with us is a positive one. We look forward to hearing from you soon!
